name: flamingo-s3
description: flamingo-s3 is a https://github.com/piobyte/flamingo addon to allow reading and converting images from https://aws.amazon.com/s3/.

scripts.typecheck: if [[ $(command -v flow) ]] ; then { flow check >&2; } ; else { echo "flow command not available, skipping type checking" >&2; } ; fi
scripts.pretest: npm run lint && npm run typecheck

author: Christian
